Newton.WBCN (FM): WBCN was a terrestrial radio station in Boston, Massachusetts. Originally broadcasting on analog 104.1 MHz (now WWBX) from 1958 to 2009, and later broadcasting as a digital-only radio station, airing on WBZ-FM HD-2 from 2009 to 2017. In December 2017, owner Beasley Broadcast Group discontinued WBCN, switching the station's format to "Hubcast", a replay of segments and podcasts from air personalities of the Sports Talk Format of WBZ-FM and WBZ-FM HD-1, known as 98.5 The Sports Hub.
